arts.ttl: Italy confirm 25-man Nations League squad: Ex-Chelsea youngster earns first call-up as four Premier League players are included
arts.sum: Italy head coach Luciano Spalletti names his 25-man squad for this month's UEFA Nations League quarter-final tie against Germany.

arts.ttl: Milan Eyeing Another Torino Midfielder Besides Ricci
arts.sum: Milan will make another attempt for Samuele Ricci in the summer, with better chances of being successful this time around, but they have recently taken an interest in another Torino midfielder, Cesare Casadei. He has had a big impact since joining. The post Milan Eyeing Another Torino Midfielder Besides Ricci appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Napoli seal move for Empoli’s Luca Marianucci
arts.sum: Serie A side Napoli have now sealed a move for Empoli youngster Luca Marianucci, who will join the club in the summer. Sky Italia’s Francesco Modugno has spoken to Radio…
There are still just three points separating Serie A's top three ahead of Week 29 and Steve Davies has predictions for all 10 games in the Italian top-flight.

Despite taking the lead twice, Torino were unable to secure the three points last week, as Parma rescued a point in the latter stages of the game. The Granata sit in 11th place and host Empoli, who a...

arts.ttl: Napoli Put Their Hands on Up-and-Coming Empoli Defender
arts.sum: Napoli have reached an agreement in principle with Empoli for Luca Marianucci. The parties are ironing out the final details and could announce the deal in the next few days already. The Azzurri had identified him as a fallback for Pietro Comuzzo. The post Napoli Put Their Hands on Up-and-Coming Empoli Defender appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.
